name: Bloodbath (itch) (Max)
description:
Bloodbath is my first finished game/prototype. I wanted to create a 2D shoot'em up styled game with similar recoil systems to counter strike and hotline Miami, I plan to come back to this project further down my career to make a full game with all of my own assets and more content.

Until then, please try out the game and offer suggestions for when i come back to it!

Controls: Space to dash, Q for grenades, E to interact/pickup, WASD for movement.
